problem_validation.market_size_estimate: Large, affecting many startups and businesses

evidence.key_insight: Market research can be used to prove business idea validation in various service disciplines.
All my startup ideas failed as there are tons of existing business sharing same ideas already.
Big companies spend nearly 5-10% of their annual revenue on market research.
Conducting market research helps identify potential challenges and ways to enhance your business idea.
Many entrepreneurs struggle with moving forward to validate their business ideas in real life.

alternative_solutions.name: [SEMrush]
alternative_solutions.approach: Provides tools for keyword research and market analysis.
limitations: Can be expensive for small businesses.

alternative_solutions.name: [Google Keyword Planner]
alternative_solutions.approach: Offers insights into keyword trends and search volumes.

problem_statement_feedback:
- Accuracy: The statement accurately describes the real problem of validation challenges.
- Specificity: It is specific enough, focusing on market size, competition, and demand.
- Improvements: Consider including more about the emotional and financial impact on entrepreneurs.
research_limitations: No significant access restrictions or CAPTCHAs encountered.
